title: Sonica
author: Sonica
content: I have 2 iPad Pro M2 11 inch 128GB 2022 in new condition that I'm selling for €870 or buy both for €1720. The products were purchased in the US so it includes a US plug. I will include a free US to power schuko adapter. Free shipping within the EU. Contact me for any questions or for me pictures.

comments.author: agentF
comments.body: Quote from: Sonica on March 19, 2023, 08:07:38 PMI have 2 iPad Pro M2 11 inch 128GB 2022 in new condition that I'm selling for €870 or buy both for €1720. The products were purchased in the US so it includes a US plug. I will include a free US to power schuko adapter. Free shipping within the EU. Contact me for any questions or for me pictures. If i'll cover the cost of an escrow, including DHL.Are you still willing to make the deal?
